channel.title: I'm going to make a simple 2d game
channel.description:
And I want the community to design it for me. Let's keep it arcade based, so no multiplayer, advanced storylines, roleplaying, etc. A simple game with simple winning, losing, and strategies. I'll convert the game into a tutorial and explained how I made it.
Let's get them ideas rolling! :)

item.title: I'm going to make a simple 2d game
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

runewings317:

Why no story lines and no role playing? :o

Because thats for you guys to finish

Read full topic

pac man

galaga

whack-a-mole

item.source: I'm going to make a simple 2d game

item.title: I'm going to make a simple 2d game
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Im going to say I’d like to see something that is a 2d game and not an iphone type full-arcade game.

So what about a 2d version of Clue, except its in an old abandoned looking neighborhood?

That covers
maps
sprites
animations
buildings
collision
dialogue

Just create a series of chats and then randomize them over all of the npcs, of course people would know how to beat it after their first playthrough but theyll get a tutorial also. Its easy for player to switch out with their own content (if they don’t know enough yet), aka modding, which is the very very very first step in game development.

Read full topic
item.source: I'm going to make a simple 2d game
